name: Flora

pages.text: There are many, many, $(italic)many$() different types of plants in TerraFirmaCraft. Some would say over nine thousand. Those people would be wrong.$(br2)Different plants appear in different $(l:the_world/climate)Climates$(), and their appearance may change over the current season - going through cycles of flowering and laying dormant, or changing color as the local temperature changes.
